messages.body:
23 July 2013
Hello Sir
I am Brian Nikoi, a young boy of 19 years old from Mali but currently residing in Bujumbura Refugee Camp, Accra Ghana for almost three months now as a refugee. I am the only surviving child of late Joshua Nikoi who traded in gold and diamond before his assassination during the ongoing civil war in my country Mali, my father, mother, and two sisters were assassinated and burnt beyond recognition by rebels after looting cash, diamonds and gold from my family but somehow spared my life.
Before contacting you have seek advice of few elderly people around me in the refugee camp without letting them know my plan. I was told that even if I send this email to you, you will not believe because of too much scam and other ways of deceiving people. Please understand that this email is not to deceive you to give me money but for you to help me in what I feel belongs to me. Please don't be confused or have doubt about me and don't see me as a bad person because I am not.
I am contacting you in respect of the sum of $5,500.000.00 deposited by my late father in a Security Company before he died. This money is part of money he realized from the sales of diamonds and gold by him. I got your contact from the Ghana chambers of commerce business executives' directory and having been convinced that you are a reliable and trusted man capable of handling a transaction of this magnitude, I decided to entrust you with this great task.
My father did told me  about this deposit with this Security Company in Ghana before he died, and when I  came to Ghana after his death I found the security Company and I confirmed that the consignment box  containing $5.5M was still in their safe custody. Due to my refugee status, I am not qualified to claim the deposit hence I have solicited for your help. Note that my late father deposited the money with the Security Company as family treasures for safe keeping so the Security Company is unaware that the actual content is cash.
What I want you to do for me now is to stand as my new trustee and guardian to claim my late father consignment box from the Security Company for investment and safe keeping for me and once you receive it, I will immediately proceed to you and continue my studies in your country in order to have a brighter future. Please if you are willing and interested to help as requested kindly reply me then I will give you contact information of the Security Company for you to contact them as my new trustee and guardian and inform them of your desire to claim the deposited consignment from their custody. I will be very pleased if you accept to help me because I really need someone to help me with this.
Thank you and God bless you 
Your son
Brian Nikoi (Refugee)
